content.text:
# Pumpkings

#REDIRECT Masterplan (band)

---

## PumpKings

| rev2      = MMH Radio
| rev2score = 3/5
}}
PumpKings is the sixth studio album by the German power metal band Masterplan, released on 30 June 2017. It is a cover album consisting entirely of songs written by Roland Grapow during his membership in Helloween, re-recorded and re-arranged for the occasion.
It is the band's first album with new drummer Kevin Kott. The band's cover of "Escalation 666" was released as a single on 14 July 2017. The album has received mixed feedback from critics.
Track listing
Line-up
* Rick Altzi – vocals
* Roland Grapow – guitar
* Jari Kainulainen – bass
* Kevin Kott – drums
* Axel Mackenrott – keyboards
Production
* Roland Grapow – production, recording, mixing, mastering at Grapow Studios
